summary: This is an email from attorney Darren K. Indyke to Ira Zicherman at Bear Stearns, certifying the corporate ownership structure linking Jeffrey E. Epstein to Jeepers, Inc. through Financial Trust Company, Inc. It establishes Epstein as the beneficial owner of Jeepers, Inc. and includes standard legal disclaimers.

persons.context: Identified as the sole stockholder of Financial Trust Company, Inc. and, through that holding, the beneficial owner of Jeepers, Inc.

Zicherman, at Bear Stearns, is receiving official certification about Epstein's corporate holdings, indicating a financial/institutional relationship.

events.title: Ownership Certification for Jeepers, Inc.
events.description: Attorney Darren K. Indyke sends an email to Ira Zicherman at Bear Stearns certifying that Financial Trust Company, Inc. is the sole stockholder of Jeepers, Inc., and that Jeffrey Epstein is the sole stockholder and beneficial owner of both entities.

locations: 457 Madison Avenue 4th Floor New York, NY 10022 (Darren Indyke's office address)
US Virgin Islands (Jurisdiction of incorporation for Financial Trust Company, Inc. and Jeepers, Inc.)
keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein is identified as the sole stockholder of Financial Trust Company, Inc. and the beneficial owner of Jeepers, Inc.
The corporate structure involves two US Virgin Islands corporations: Financial Trust Company, Inc. and Jeepers, Inc.
The communication is an official certification from Epstein's attorney, Darren K. Indyke, to a Bear Stearns employee, likely for banking or financial compliance purposes.
The document demonstrates the use of layered corporate entities (Jeepers, Inc. owned by Financial Trust Company, Inc., owned by Epstein) to hold assets.
The email includes standard legal disclaimers regarding tax advice and attorney-client confidentiality.
